abstract: If you have ever wondered just how robust your computer is, Microsoft has a built-in feature included in Windows Vista and Windows 7 that measures the hardware's capability.
lead_paragraph: If you have ever wondered just how robust your computer is under the hood, Microsoft has a built-in feature included in Windows Vista and Windows 7 that measures the hardware's capability. Dubbed the Windows Experience Index, the tool analyzes several of the computer's hardware components to generate a "base score." Microsoft says these base scores can be taken into consideration when buying programs to run on the machine.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Looking Under a PC's Hood
